value.title: Elon Musk
value.excerpt: Elon Musk is the co-founder and CEO at Tesla, overseeing all product design, engineering and manufacturing of the company's electric vehicles, battery products, and Solar Roofs.
value.name: Elon Musk
value.bio: Elon Musk is the co-founder and CEO at Tesla, overseeing all product design, engineering and manufacturing of the company's electric vehicles, battery products, and Solar Roofs.

value.title: Lex Fridman
value.excerpt: Research in machine learning, autonomous vehicles and human-centered AI at MIT and beyond. Host of the Artificial Intelligence podcast.
value.name: Lex Fridman
value.bio: Research in machine learning, autonomous vehicles and human-centered AI at MIT and beyond. Host of the Artificial Intelligence podcast.

value.title: John Carmack
value.excerpt: Consulting CTO at Oculus VR. Working on artificial general intelligence (AGI) in Facebook
value.name: John Carmack
value.bio: Consulting CTO at Oculus VR. Working on artificial general intelligence (AGI) in Facebook

value.title: Ilya Sutskever
value.excerpt: Co-founder and Chief Scientist of OpenAI. I spent three wonderful years as a Research Scientist at the Google Brain Team. Before that, I was a co-founder of DNNresearch. And before that, I was a postdoc in Stanford with Andrew Ng's group. And in the beginning, I was a student in the Machine Learning group of Toronto, working with Geoffrey Hinton.
value.name: Ilya Sutskever
value.bio: Co-founder and Chief Scientist of OpenAI. I spent three wonderful years as a Research Scientist at the Google Brain Team. Before that, I was a co-founder of DNNresearch. And before that, I was a postdoc in Stanford with Andrew Ng's group. And in the beginning, I was a student in the Machine Learning group of Toronto, working with Geoffrey Hinton.

value.title: Andrej Karpathy
value.excerpt: Director of AI at Tesla. Previously a Research Scientist at OpenAI, and CS PhD student at Stanford. I like to train Deep Neural Nets on large datasets.
value.name: Andrej Karpathy
value.bio: Director of AI at Tesla. Previously a Research Scientist at OpenAI, and CS PhD student at Stanford. I like to train Deep Neural Nets on large datasets.

value.title: Andrew Ng
value.excerpt: Co-Founder of Coursera; Stanford CS adjunct faculty. Former head of Baidu AI Group/Google Brain. #ai #machinelearning, #deeplearning #MOOCs

value.bio: Co-Founder of Coursera; Stanford CS adjunct faculty. Former head of Baidu AI Group/Google Brain. #ai #machinelearning, #deeplearning #MOOCs

value.title: Yann LeCun
value.excerpt: Yann LeCun is a French-American computer scientist working primarily in the fields of machine learning, computer vision, mobile robotics, and computational neuroscience.
value.name: Yann LeCun
value.bio: Yann LeCun is a French-American computer scientist working primarily in the fields of machine learning, computer vision, mobile robotics, and computational neuroscience.

value.title: Animashree Anandkumar
value.excerpt: Animashree Anandkumar is the Bren Professor of Computing at California Institute of Technology. She is a director of Machine Learning research at NVIDIA. Her research considers tensor-algebraic methods, deep learning and non-convex problems.
value.name: Animashree Anandkumar
value.bio: Animashree Anandkumar is the Bren Professor of Computing at California Institute of Technology. She is a director of Machine Learning research at NVIDIA. Her research considers tensor-algebraic methods, deep learning and non-convex problems.

value.bio: Founder and CEO at Scale AI - a data platform for AI.

topItems.title: Yoshua Bengio
topItems.excerpt: Yoshua Bengio OC FRSC is a Canadian computer scientist, most noted for his work on artificial neural networks and deep learning. He was a co-recipient of the 2018 ACM A.M. Turing Award for his work in deep learning.

topItems.title: Geoffrey Hinton
topItems.excerpt: Geoffrey Everest Hinton CC FRS FRSC is an English Canadian cognitive psychologist and computer scientist, most noted for his work on artificial neural networks. Since 2013 he divides his time working for Google and the University of Toronto.

value.title: Soumith Chintala
value.excerpt:
I ❤ research -- multi-modal world models, robots.
I think deeply about lowering the barrier to use A.I.
I co-created and lead PyTorch at Facebook A.I.

value.title: 'Godfathers of AI' won 2018 Turing Award

topItems.title: Jean Liu
topItems.excerpt: Liu Qing or Jean Liu, is a Chinese business executive. Liu is the President of Didi Chuxing, China's largest mobile transportation platform. She worked at Goldman Sachs Asia for 12 years, becoming a managing director in 2012, before switching to Didi Dache serving as its chief operating officer in July 2014.
topItems.name: Jean Liu
topItems.bio: Liu Qing or Jean Liu, is a Chinese business executive. Liu is the President of Didi Chuxing, China's largest mobile transportation platform. She worked at Goldman Sachs Asia for 12 years, becoming a managing director in 2012, before switching to Didi Dache serving as its chief operating officer in July 2014.

topItems.title: Joy Buolamwini
